column1: Grip was a large wolf-like Dogs
column2: one of three kept by Farmer Maggot on his farm at Bamfurlong in the Marish. Like Maggots other dogs
column5: but also completely obedient to his master. Grip was with Maggot when they encountered one of the Nazgûl searching for Baggins Family
column6: and at that time his obedience and ferocity failed: he yelped in terror and ran from the Nazgûl.
